Container.Name: Shapeshifter-Obfuscator
Container.Overview:
Shapeshifter-Obfuscator is a dockerized implementation of shapeshifter-dispatcher provided by The Operator Foundation. The shapeshifter suite provides command-line proxy and obfuscation tools that effectively modify packets to evade advanced IDS systems.
This container is targeted at advanced users and provides no graphical user interface. Refer to the shapeshifter-dispatcher documentation on GitHub to learn more about the different proxy modes and transports supported by this tool.
https://github.com/OperatorFoundation/shapeshifter-dispatcher

Config.Name: Command
Config.Description: Shapeshifter-Obfuscator start-up argument. Change 127.0.0.1:3333 to an IP on your subnet.

Config.Name: Listen Port
Config.Description: Port that Shapeshifter-Obfuscator will listen on. Change it as necessary.
